【Causal unisex crescent bag】 Versatile fashion casual waist bag has adjustable straps, it can be used as a cross bag, shoulder bag, waist bag, or fanny pack, suitable for various dressing styles, such as workwear style, ivy style, casual style, sports style, biker style, etc

【Adjustable straps and double zippers】The crossbody crescent bag can adjust the straps according to your own needs, and the soft straps are also very friendly to bare skin! At the same time, the fanny pack has a double zipper design, and the smooth zipper makes you don't worry about the zipper getting stuck！

【Waterproof and Durable】The crossbody bag is made of durable nylon fabric, waterproof and durable, lightweight, just only 150g! The Fanny pack is easy to clean and maintain, perfect for holding makeup, sunscreen cream lipstick, keys, mini fans, and more! Great for shopping tours, hiking, gym, and cycling!

【Classic Simple Design】Classic minimalist design, sailboat-style design, make it more space. The nylon crossbody purse has a separate design, which is convenient for classifying your items. You can put credit cards, passports, ID cards, mobile phones, power banks, water bottles, umbrellas, and others you want to carry.
【Best Gift】This is the best gift for boys and girls! It can be used as a gift for Valentine's Day, Birthday Party, New Year, Christmas, Mother's Day, Father's Day, etc.

Is the bag water repellent? Yes, Iioscre Crossbody sling bag is made of high-quality nylon material and has water repellent function. (It is good for Rain sputtering) Can this sling bag be worn over the shoulder only? The crossbody sling pack has many different ways to be carried. You may hang in the arm, catche top handle/shoulder strap, wear on the front, sling on one shouler. It depends on anyway you want. Is It has compartment? Yes, It has a big compartment, It can hold lipstick, sunglasses, sunscreen, passport, wallet, umbrella, etc, and is very suitable for travel, hiking, cycling and other activities, and even for school. How long can the strap be adjusted？ The overall length of the strap can reach 48 inches, meeting the needs of most people Is the color the same as the picture? All product pictures are actual photos, which may be different from the real object due to lighting, screen color difference, personal color perception and other reasons. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excited to have a practical, everyday option
reviews.reviewText: The strap is extremely customizable and I found a length that fit my height and shape perfectly. The contour of the bag itself makes it very natural to carry and doesn't add obvious bulk to the silhouette. I bought a plain black bag to make it as neutral and as possible and easy to camouflage, but that meant that it was hard to differentiate between the main body and the pocket of the bag's inside. I solved that by sewing on bright red bias tape; simple enough. Overall extremely satisfied with the versatility, aesthetic thoughtfulness, and feel (literal and metaphorical) of this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great so far!
reviews.reviewText: I just started using mine so I can’t say how it will hold up to wear and tear. I was pleased with the size and the shape, and it is very lightweight. It even holds my previous cross body bag as well as my sunglasses (which were too big for it) and there’s actually even more space.The one thing I would like that is missing is a spot to clip on my keys (that are on a carabiner) but my old too small cross body bag inside of it serves that purpose.Some people said the material is thin and cheap looking. I don’t think it looks cheap and being thin is an advantage.A good value for the price, slightly over $10.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good everyday bag
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been using this bag everyday for a couple months now. The most annoying thing about it is that it doesn’t have any dividers or pockets except for one piece of fabric that separates the interior of the bag into two. This results in a lot of time wasted searching for stuff. That said, this bag holds a lot, doesn’t stain easily, and goes with basically any outfit. It’s held up very well through daily use and I haven’t noticed any quality problems.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Versatile and stylish
reviews.reviewText: Perfect adjustable fit with plenty of room for all that you need to carry. Great for travel, as it folds up nicely to fit in a personal item carry for later use. I also appreciated the weather resistant exterior. Easy to wipe down to keep clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love pieces that are very versatile! This does not disappoint as the strap very quickly and easily transitions from is one shoulder strap to a crossbody strap and back again! I hate purses with 13 different compartments, this has one main compartment and one interior pocket. My only complaint is that the interior pocket compartment is pretty slouchy and I never know if I’m reaching into the side or main compartment. But I can live with this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Perfect size and cute
reviews.reviewText: Zipper quality is good and smooth. Just a basic bag with perfect size so it goes well with a lot of outfits. Bag itself is soo lightweight so it is comfortable when wearing it. But the fabric looks a little cheap and it is not 100% waterproof which I expected. Does get wet and dries slowly

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: THE FABRIC IS STRONG, THE PURSE IS LIGHTWEIGHT AND IT HAS SECTIONS THAT MAKE ORGANIZING ITEMS EASY! I CAN HAVE MY PHONE HANDY ALL THE TIME WITHOUT WORRYING THAT IT WILL BE SCRATCHED UP. THERE IS ALSO PLENTY OF ROOM FOR A MIRROR, COMB, AND SMALL WALLET.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for school
reviews.reviewText: I carry heavy leather bags usually. But for going back to college, this little bag is perfect. Light as a feather and strong zipper. Love it.

reviews.reviewTitle: Just what I was looking for
reviews.reviewText: This is the exact bag I was looking for. It doesn’t have any structure at all which has pros and cons. I am able to fit in everything I need including my iPad. I do wish that it had some interior pockets. It has one slip pocket that is quite big but again, the bag has no structure so smaller items often fall out of this interior pocket. If the inner pocket had a zipper it would be better. The fabric is easy to wipe clean and the crossbody strap is sturdy and adjustable. Great bag for the price.

Material is some kind of plastic, which I don't like. The strap keeps moving up down on its own and gets tangled in. Not as practical as I thought. it's big enough to carry everything needed, but need to shuffle in to find stuff in there.

reviews.reviewTitle: Cute, practical, and worth the buy!
reviews.reviewText: I love it!! Cute and light weight. Great size too (pretty accurate to description). The inside layout is basic but it serves its purpose.
Cute bag! Similar to baggu’s cres. Bag, but less structural. Really thin materials. But very waterproof! Went to a concert in downpour rain and everything inside was dry!
It’s the perfect everyday back. You can adjust the straps and the bag itself fits so much. Good quality material as well.
